overview:
My name is Wisdoliu Ben and I live in ShenZhen, GuangDong, China, Beautiful coast city. At present unmarried. I’ve had the chance to interview some truly amazing and well-known people who shared their lives with me and my audience. It’s been a great feeling to know that I’ve helped impact my community through information and entertainment!

I enjoy various kinds of sports like hiking, tennis, badminton, jogging, bicycling, etc.
